metadata.name: Suspicious RASdial Activity
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious process related to rasdial.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('rasdial.exe')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious process related to rasdial.exe

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment Reference: https://twitter.com/subTee/status/891298217907830785
